messages.<color=\"#ffd479\">/loot</color> - Displ: <color="#ffd479">/loot</color> - Displays the details on loot tables
messages.A barrel drops up to %N% items, a chest: A barrel drops up to %N% items, a chest up to %M% items.
messages.Base item rarity is %N% and base bluepri: Base item rarity is %N% and base blueprint rarity is %M%.
messages.Drop limit of '%NAME%' has been changed: Drop limit of '%NAME%' has been changed from %LIMIT% to %NEWLIMIT%
messages.The blueprint '%NAME%' is now no longer: The blueprint '%NAME%' is now no longer blacklisted
messages.The item '%NAME%' is now no longer black: The item '%NAME%' is now no longer blacklisted
messages.There is a <color=#5bbcf4>%P%%</color> c: There is a <color=#5bbcf4>%P%%</color> chance to get one of %N% %RARITY% blueprints.
messages.There is a <color=#aef45b>%N%%</color> c: There is a <color=#aef45b>%N%%</color> chance that any drop is a blueprint.
messages.There is a <color=#f4e75b>%P%%</color> c: There is a <color=#f4e75b>%P%%</color> chance to get one of %N% %RARITY% items.
messages.You are not authorized to modify drop li: You are not authorized to modify drop limits
messages.You are not authorized to modify the bla: You are not authorized to modify the blacklist
